strIntroduction: Seventy kilometers south-west of Bangkok the Mae Klong River spreads into a sprawling delta before reaching the Gulf of Thailand. This low-lying land is extremely fertile and over hundreds of years the Thai people have constructed an extensive network of canals to aid irrigation and navigation. The local way of life has remained traditional, agricultural and revolves around the colourful floating markets where the fruits of the surrounding orchards are traded.
The Sky Fox is a fantastic ride for those that like to experience a feeling of pure freedom. You can slide along the cables from tree top to tree top and feel what it's like to fly.

Would you like to squeeze some diving fun into your Koh Samui itinerary? Hop on board and let's visit two main dive destinations from Koh Samui: Sail Rock and Koh Tao, including the fantastic Chumporn Pinnacle!
strTitle: Fun Diving in Koh Samui － Visit Koh Samui's Best Diving Sites in One Day

strIntroduction: If you're one of the millions of budding cooks around the world who would like to make your own Thai food, then a cooking class is for you. Learn directly from professional Thai cooks who will teach you about the flavors, ingredients and techniques in cooking Thai food. You'll get to taste the food as you go. And finally, at the end of your class, you'll get an apron and certificate to take home with you.
strTitle: Baan Hongnual Cookery School Full Day Tour

strIntroduction: Imagine yourself on a private exotic island with a breathtaking beautiful beach and vivid reef! The wonderful island of Mai Ton has been in private use for years, but will now finally welcome tourist for day trips. This paradise island with its white sandy beach can be visited exclusively on Love Andaman’s new excursion. The daily amount of visitors is limited, and thus the 1000 meter long beach is guaranteed not to become overcrowded. During the excursion you can relax on the amazing beach, dive into the crystal clear water for a refreshing swim or snorkeling giant clam garden and enjoy the spectacular array of fish and corals on display under the surface! Delicious lunch BBQ buffet, topped off with milk shakes, ice-cream, coffee/tea and soft drinks. Departure from the harbor is at 10 am. For a brief 15 minutes boat trip which makes this excursion ideal for all ages.

strIntroduction: Trip Description : Chiang Mai City-Culture-Ride is a half day cycling tour that takes you trough and around the rich cultural centre of Chiang Mai.
Manukan Island and Sapi Island are 2 of the most beautiful islands in Sabah. Enjoy this 1 day tour with KKday to experience the Malaysian excitements!
Have a fun-filled day in Sunway Lagoon, one of Malaysia’s award-winning theme parks and discover a magical kingdom of pure fun & excitement.
Semporna is the paradise for snorkeling enthusiasts. Therefore island hopping tour is a must-do here. Come with KKday and explore the world under the sea.

Located at Kota Belud township, Kawa Kawa wetland is newly opened by the authority of Sabah. As there is daily visitors limitation, the wetland here is more well-conserved. You can meet a lot of Proboscis Monkeys & Fireflies here and being impressed by the beautiful sunsetting view.

Mantanani Islands are a group of three isolated islands located northwest of Kota Belud. This place is well-known for the snorkeling spots and beautiful views underneath the ocean. Let's explore the natural wonderland with KKday.

Discover the old and the new on this half-day tour which is designed to give you the best possible introduction to this bustling city and immerse yourself in the city’s character and charm. See the city’s most iconic landmarks including the King's Palace, National Monument, Independence Square and the famous Petronas Twin Towers. Sit back and enjoy a panoramic drive along the classy streets that reveals the contrasting sights of modern skyscrapers and colonial architecture.
strTitle: Kuala Lumpur City & Landmarks Half Day Tour

strIntroduction: KKday will bring you to experience multiple exciting Sabah activities in the 1 day trip, Kiulu Water Rafting, Zip Borneo and Kokol Hill Highland.
strTitle: 1 Day Kiulu Water Rafting and Jungle Zipline Trip

strIntroduction: KKday will bring you to discover the beautiful Mountain Kinabalu, famous Poring Hot Spring, natural fish spa, mysterious Canopy Walk and the BEST roasted wild roar!

Make your way to the district of Kuala Penyu and hop on a boat to Pulau Tiga! The island’s claim to fame is none other than being the first ever ‘secret’ location for the hit reality series, ‘Survivor’. Hence, many refer to Pulau Tiga as Survivor Island. Located just 10km off shore on the West Coast of Sabah, you can enjoy a day trip to the island but many recommend spending at least a night or two.
strTitle: Day Trip to Snorkel and Jungle Trek at Pulau Tiga

strIntroduction: Paragliding has started in Sabah for quite some years and in recent years it becomes a popular sport. Come with KKday and explore Sabah from the blue sky.
strTitle: Renau Paragliding and Mt. Kinabalu 1 Day Adventure

strTitle: Kota Kinabalu City Attractions and Ka'andaman Spa 1 Day Tour

strIntroduction: Explore the natural diversity of Sabah with KKday!

Head out of the metropolis and visit the extraordinary Batu Caves, a limestone hill riddled with caves and cave temples. Climb the 272 steps to the shrine of Hindu Lord Murugan, visited by over a million pilgrims every year on the annual Thaipusam festival.
strTitle: Kuala Lumpur Countryside Delights - Batu Caves Half-Day Tour

strIntroduction: Don't know where to spend your summer time? Come with KKday, enjoy the tropical fruit feast and explore the natural diversity of Sabah!

strIntroduction: Take a ride on the North Borneo Railway and relive the nostalgic romance of British North Borneo. Passengers experience the lush landscape of the coastal and rural regions of Sabah. A typical ‘tiffin’ colonial lunch will be served on the return trip.
